item.title: A Pair of Beomaster 1900 Receivers for Restoration: Unit #2 Performance Testing and a Volume Control LDR Problem
item.description: Today, I completed some service manual adjustments on the Beomaster 1900 and started evaluating its performance by measuring THD and Frequency Response. The first adjustments involved setting the tuning voltage for FM 1 and FM 5 according to the Beomaster 1900 service manual. The procedure involves setting the FM 1 tuning potentiometer (4R3) to the 88MHz dial position and adjusting trimmer 4R2 to achieve a reading of 4.5 VDC at test point 4TP1 with FM 1 selected as the audio source.
